00018 #ifndef FAP_MACROS_H__
00019 #define FAP_MACROS_H__
00020 
00021 
00022 
00023 // Implementation for nRF24L01
00024 
00025 #define FAP_INIT_TIMER()        (TCCR0A = 0x02, TCCR0B = 0x03, OCR0A  = 200) // Timer 0 CTC Mode with prescaler set to Clk/64 => 4µs time unit
00026 #define FAP_NRF_INIT_IRQ()      (EICRB = 0x08)           // Set interrupt activation on falling edge
00027                          
00028  
00029 #define FAP_NRF_IRQ_ENABLE()    (EIMSK = EIMSK | 0x20)   //enables external NRF interrupt
00030 #define FAP_NRF_IRQ_DISABLE()   (EIMSK = EIMSK & 0xDF)   //disables external NRF interrupt
00031 #define FAP_TIMER_IRQ_ENABLE()  (TIMSK0 = 0x02)          //enables the Fap timer IRQ
00032 #define FAP_TIMER_IRQ_DISABLE() (TIMSK0 = 0x00)          //disables the Fap timer IRQ
00033 
00034 
00035 
00036 
00037 #endif // FAP_MACROS_H__
